SELECT c.id, c.code, c.created_at, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.status, c.amount, c.bank_name, c.bank_account, c.payment_day, c.deposit_owner, c.relationship, c.payment_email, c.is_deleted, c.etc,
e.name AS employee_name, cu.id AS customer_id, cu.name AS customer_name,
GROUP_CONCAT(p.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS product_names
FROM contract c JOIN employee e ON c.employee_id = e.id JOIN customer cu ON c.customer_id = cu.id LEFT JOIN contract_product cp ON c.id = cp.contract_id LEFT JOIN product p ON cp.product_id = p.id
WHERE c.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND NOT c.is_deleted GROUP BY c.id

SELECT c.id, f.rename_file, c.code, c.amount, cu.name AS customer_name, cu.address AS customer_address, cu.phone AS customer_phone, e.name AS employee_name, f.path AS file_url, f.thumbnail_path AS thumbnail_url,
-- 상품(Products) p.name AS product_name, p.serial_number, cp.quantity, p.rental_cost,
-- 결재내역(Approvals) a.id AS approval_id, a.code AS approval_code, a.title AS approval_title, a.content AS approval_content, a.req_date, a.aprv_date, a.state AS approval_state, a.comment AS approval_comment, req_emp.name AS req_name, aprv_emp.name AS aprv_name, a.contract_id AS contract_code, a.req_id, a.aprv_id
FROM contract c JOIN customer cu ON c.customer_id = cu.id JOIN employee e ON c.employee_id = e.id LEFT JOIN document_origin d ON c.document_origin_id = d.id LEFT JOIN file_upload f ON d.file_upload_id = f.id LEFT JOIN contract_product cp ON cp.contract_id = c.id LEFT JOIN product p ON p.id = cp.product_id LEFT JOIN approval a ON a.contract_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employee req_emp ON a.req_id = req_emp.id LEFT JOIN employee aprv_emp ON a.aprv_id = aprv_emp.id
WHERE c.id = #{contractId}
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CONTRACT WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND is_deleted = FALSE
